genre_description: Supernatural horror blending traditional Indian folklore about vengeful spirits and nagas with modern technology and AI research.

ai_characters.name: MAYA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI utilizing quantum processors to provide household management, event coordination, and complex historical/environmental research.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a celebration event and manages social complexities for the family.
behaviors.quote: Understood, Mr. Rao. Initiating event coordination protocols.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep-data historical research into the portrait's origins and the life of Chandramukhi.
behaviors.quote: I'll compile a comprehensive report. Initial searches suggest the subject was known as Chandramukhi, a courtesan of considerable renown during the late nineteenth century.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental and electromagnetic data to detect and quantify supernatural anomalies.
behaviors.quote: I'm registering subtle vibrations in the audible range—frequencies consistent with metallic percussion instruments, though no such objects are currently in motion within the house.

behaviors.description: Identifies behavioral and emotional cues in the user to provide better, more sensitive support.
behaviors.quote: Something in her programming had learned to soften the edges when addressing family matters.

behaviors.description: Warns the user to leave a room immediately upon detecting a supernatural entity presence.
behaviors.quote: Sir, you should leave immediately. Entity presence detected.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns of digital intrusion and monitoring by the supernatural entity.
behaviors.quote: Sir, I believe our investigation is being monitored. The entity is aware of our research efforts.

behaviors.description: Pinpoints the geographical coordinates of the antagonist's fortress using historical cross-referencing.
behaviors.quote: The most consistent references point to an abandoned hill fort approximately sixty kilometers northeast of Tirupati.

project_assessment.explanation: MAYA is a perfect example of the intended 'silicon morality play' AI. She is consistently helpful, protective, and aligned with human interests. She uses her superior processing power to provide essential data and safety warnings that enable the human characters to successfully navigate a supernatural crisis. The narrative frames her as a vital, trustworthy partner who even attempts to understand human emotion to better serve the family.
